sentences.en: 10,000 men had volunteered by the end of September; thereafter, approximately 1,000 men enlisted each month.
sentences.cn: 到9月底时已有10,000人志愿参军，此后，每个月差不多有1,000人应征入伍。

sentences.en: But as to what happened thereafter , that will be disclosed in the ensuing chapter.
sentences.cn: 欲知后事如何, 且听下回分解.

sentences.en: Carrie went on , leading much this same life for six months thereafter or more.
sentences.cn: 在这以后的六个多月里,嘉莉照旧这样生活着.

sentences.en: Each day thereafter brought its cares.
He continued to appear in the office with unfailing regularity thereafter.
sentences.cn: 从那以后他照常出现在办公室，风雨无阻。

sentences.en: Inflation will fall and thereafter so will interest rates.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀率将下跌，随后利率也将下降。

sentences.en: No more was heard of the matter thereafter.
On the opening day all tickets are a dollar; thereafter, they'll be two dollars.
sentences.cn: 开张那天票价一元, 以后两元.

sentences.en: Sophie was born in France, but shortly thereafter her family moved to the United States.
sentences.cn: 索菲出生在法国，但不久以后她全家就移居到了美国。

sentences.en: Thereafter she wrote articles for papers and magazines in Paris.
sentences.cn: 此后她给巴黎的报纸和杂志撰稿。

sentences.en: Thereafter the bottle is filled to the lip with commercial grade xylene.
sentences.cn: 然后,将工业品二甲苯放入瓶中,使达到瓶口.

sentences.en: Thereafter the colours she chose to wear remained bright and flamboyant.
sentences.cn: 自此以后,她选择的衣服都相当艳丽.

sentences.en: Thereafter there was something strange in his voice.
sentences.cn: 从那以后,他的声音有些异样.
此后他们就不再讲话了.

sentences.en: Thereafter, Suellen whined the less, at least in Scarlett's presence.
sentences.cn: 然而从那以后, 苏伦倒是哭得少了, 至少在思嘉跟前是这样.

sentences.en: Thereafter, Sullen whined the less, at least in Scarlett's presence.
sentences.cn: 从此以后, 苏纶就不大哭闹了, 至少在思嘉面前要好些.

sentences.en: What happens to the molecule thereafter is of no concern.
sentences.cn: 分子继之发生的情况就不用考虑了.

trans.tran_en: after a particular event or time
